nodes.text: The Ewoks Join the Fight is a picture book written by Bonnie Bogart and illustrated by Diane deGroat that adapts the film Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It was published by Random House on June 12, 1983, and a book-and-record version was also produced.
The Ewoks, natives of a tiny moon called Endor, come to the aid of the Rebel Alliance in its climactic battle against the evil Galactic Empire.
